Applications are invited for research staff position in Samsung Advanced Institute of Technology (Korea). The work involves transmission electron microscopy or scanning electron microscopy investigations.
Candidates should have an experience in transmission electron microscopy or in high resolution scanning electron microscopy (at least 3 years) and have a high level of English language. A PhD degree will be an advantage.
Candidates are expected to send curriculum vitae (in english) by e-mail to Dr. Dmitry D. Zaytsev e-mail: dmitry.zaytsev@samsung.com
The deadline for resume application is September 15.
